title: 2016/17 NBA全季總結 - 最成功轉會

replies.msg:
有人出咗英超，唔爭在出埋NBA

最成功轉會候選名單 (只限正選/主力球員) (包括Free agent) (排名不分先後)

1. Jusuf Nurkic (DEN->POR)
2. Rajon Rondo (SAC->CHI)
3. Demarcus Cousins (SAC->NO)
4. Taj Gibson (CHI->OKC)
5. Dion Waiters (OKC->MIA)
6. Tony Snell (CHI->MIL)
7. Lou Williams (LAL->HOU)
8. Kevin Durant (OKC->GSW)
9. Joe Johnson (MIA->UTA)
10.Eric Gordon (NO->HOU)
11.Nene (WSH->HOU)
12.Lance Stephenson (NO->IND)
13.Seth Curry (SAC->DAL)
14.Dewayne Dedmon (ORL->SA)
15.Ryan Anderson (NO->HOU)
16.Others (Please specify)

因為太多轉會，所以漏咗好多都唔出奇 點睇?

Bonus - 最失敗轉會
1. Chandler Parsons
2. Joakim Noah
3. Andrew Bogut
